fields.Title: THOUGHT / WORLD REPUBLIC
fields.Description: Rhetoric talks about Communism --The World Republic.

fields.Title: START
input
Jump to: [You: "Roll up your sleeves and start buil..."]
You: "Can't argue with that."
fields.Dialogue Text: Can't argue with that.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Of course you do! You *are* failure..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Of course you do! You *are* failure, you *are* Communism. Absolutely vanquished, beaten, curb-stomped, shat on. While everyone else is out partying, having a callous laugh, *you* will reverse the fortune of the workers of the world.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Anyone? Anyone else? There's no one..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Anyone? Anyone else? There's no one?

fields.Title: You: "Wait, what? Firing squads? You didn..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, what? Firing squads? You didn't say anything about those.

fields.Title: You: "Oh, right. That sounds like me."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh, right. That sounds like me.

fields.Title: You: "Wait, first -- what's this *communi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait, first -- what's this *communism* even about?

fields.Title: Volition: "There's one."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's one.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Yes, you. Word on the street is you..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, you. Word on the street is you're ready to start building *communism* again!

fields.Title: You: "Love has worked out really well for..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Love has worked out really well for me. I'm a love winner.

fields.Title: You: "Get the fuck outta here! No. [Finis..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Get the fuck outta here! No. [Finish thought.]

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Good. We need tender men like you b..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good. We need tender men like you building gargantuan communism. Word on the street is it's going to be ten thousand times larger than any communism previously attempted by human beings. Is that right?

fields.Title: You: "Failure?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Failure?

fields.Title: Volition: "You should build Communism -- preci..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You should build Communism -- precisely *because* it's impossible.

fields.Title: You: "I've said *some* mildly left wing t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I've said *some* mildly left wing things but none of those.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Funky-style. Very funky. So tell me..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Funky-style. Very funky. So tell me. Do you have any questions before we fire up the Big Communism Builder, or do we get right down to it?

fields.Title: Logic: "No objections. It's mathematically..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No objections. It's mathematically impossible to achieve a classless society. Everyone knows this.

fields.Title: You: "No. Shut up. I want to lie down and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: No. Shut up. I want to lie down and let the water carry me downstream. [Discard thought.]

fields.Title: You: "Yes, we should all stop building lo..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes, we should all stop building love.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Okay, not in so many words. But don..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Okay, not in so many words. But don't deny it. You're about to rip off that mask of social democracy and reveal the monstrous seven-eyed lamb of global communism that will devour and masticate mankind.

fields.Title: You: "It's too tiring. I don't have it in..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's too tiring. I don't have it in me. I'm beat down and broken. (Opt out.)

fields.Title: You: "Roll up your sleeves and start buil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Roll up your sleeves and start building Communism. (Opt in.)

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "This conversation isn't really abou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: This conversation isn't really about love. Try to keep up, okay? This is about the communism you've *promised* to build. Word on the street is it's going to be ten thousand times larger than any communism previously attempted. Is that true?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You keep saying things like *down w..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You keep saying things like *down with the bourgeoisie*, *eat the rich*, *sodomize the land-owners*, *impale all people who have more than 25 re√°l in their pocket*, *literally murder all human beings regardless of their political beliefs* -- that kind of stuff.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Too late to back out now. You can't..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Too late to back out now. You can't make an omelet without breaking a few million eggs!

fields.Title: You: "I haven't said anything like that."
fields.Dialogue Text: I haven't said anything like that.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "So, what about all that communism y..."
fields.Dialogue Text: So, what about all that communism you've promised to build? Word on the street is you've woken up from a thousand years of slumber, promising to erect a version of communism many times greater than any attempted before. Is that true?

fields.Title: You: "I don't *do* failure."
fields.Dialogue Text: I don't *do* failure.

fields.Title: Jump to: [big_builder]
Electrochemistry: "Did someone mention cocaine? Are we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Did someone mention cocaine? Are we doing cocaine? No? I'm sure I heard someone say Cocainimism...

fields.Title: You: "What should I do?"
fields.Dialogue Text: What should I do?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Hey, psst..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Hey, psst...

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Yes -- you're ready to start buildi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes -- you're ready to start building communism *again*. You've built it before, *they've* built it before. Hasn't really worked out yet, but neither has *love* -- should we just stop building love, too?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Very well. I guess no one will buil..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Very well. I guess no one will build Communism then. Tell the working man it's over. Unless anyone has... objections?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "There's no one. Okay then. Lie down..."
fields.Dialogue Text: There's no one. Okay then. Lie down and let the water carry you downstream...

fields.Title: You: "Roll your sleeves up further and br..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Roll your sleeves up further and breathe in the pristine air. [Finish thought.]
fields.Alternate1: Roll your sleeves up and breathe in the pristine air. [Finish thought.]

fields.Title: You: "'Again'?"
fields.Dialogue Text: 'Again'?

fields.Title: You: "Good bye, Communism. [Finish though..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Good bye, Communism. [Finish thought.]

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Yes! Abject failure. Total, irrever..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Yes! Abject failure. Total, irreversible defeat on all fronts! Absolutely vanquished, beaten, curb-stomped and pissed on -- until *you* came along! *You* will reverse the fortune of the workers of the world.

fields.Title: Savoir Faire: "Let not failure ensnare you any fur..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Let not failure ensnare you any further, beautiful pixie girl! Be an acrobat! A prancing faerie queen!

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Failure. It's about failure."
fields.Dialogue Text: Failure. It's about failure.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You alone, against every living thi..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You alone, against every living thing, against every human alive: eight hundred trillion re√°l in the hands of an *impossibly* well organized ruling class; towering city blocks of bank-men who have the ears of prime ministers; million-headed armies of nations and the love of your own mother!

fields.Title: You: "Who -- me?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Who -- me?

fields.Title: You: "Look around."
fields.Dialogue Text: Look around.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Psst, hey, you!"
fields.Dialogue Text: Psst, hey, you!

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "You -- against the atom, the charm..."
fields.Dialogue Text: You -- against the atom, the charm and the spin. Where the whole world failed -- matter failed to bend to human will; human will failed to get out of bed and tie its laces -- you alone, single-handedly, will rebuild the dreams of the working class. You are The Last Communist.

fields.Title: Variable["plaza.sense_rhetoric_communism_volition_fired"]
Variable["plaza.sense_rhetoric_communism_volition_fired"]
!(Variable["plaza.sense_rhetoric_communism_volition_fired"])
Rhetoric: "Oh yeah! Get the firing squads and..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yeah! Get the firing squads and the animal wagons ready!

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Everyone can see that. So tell me,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everyone can see that. So tell me, do you have any questions before we fire up the Big Communism Builder, or do we get *right down to it*?

fields.Title: big_builder
You: "How come there's *word on the stree..."
fields.Dialogue Text: How come there's *word on the street*?

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Now get to work, comrade."
fields.Dialogue Text: Now get to work, comrade.

fields.Title: Rhetoric: "Oh yes, the *mask of ambivalence*...."
fields.Dialogue Text: Oh yes, the *mask of ambivalence*. Don't deny it. You're about to rip it off and reveal the monstrous seven-eyed lamb of global communism that will devour and masticate mankind.
